channel.title: Homes on Wenxuan's Page
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Wenxuan's Page

item.description: Intro I’m a first-year Ph.D. student at USC Ink lab. My research interest lies in natural language processing, deep learning, and information retrieval. I received B.Sc. in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. My undergraduate research was advised by Prof. Yangqiu Song.
